Message:
I’ve made candies
of all kinds of flavors...
but it still feels like
something’s missing...

Hmm...
Since it’s such a special occasion,
I want to give her something
even better this year...

Like, a candy
as pretty as a gemstone,
and just as magical...

After cleaning up the kitchen,
I headed for the library.

She should be here again today...
I knew it! She is!

Before my eyes was Miss Merlyn,
surrounded by stacks of thick books.
But, she looked as if she were
puzzling over something...

I wonder if she’s learning
some new magic...
What should I do...?

If I call out to her now,
she might get mad...
Uuu, but... I have to be brave...!

“U-Um, Miss Merlyn...!
I-I have a favor to ask...!”
